## [Learning Statistics](https://learningstatisticswithr.com/)

By [Danielle Navarro](https://learningstatisticswithr.com/)

**What is this?**

The wonderful Danielle Navarro taught an introductory statistics class for psychology students.
Her lecture notes for this class became a great book that is freely available.

1.  The book is here: [https://learningstatisticswithr.com/lsr-0.6.pdf or https://learningstatisticswithr.com/book/](https://learningstatisticswithr.com/lsr-0.6.pdf%20or%20https://learningstatisticswithr.com/book/)
2.  The repository with all the source materials is here: <https://github.com/djnavarro/rbook>
